full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PAR GSER SKYEMS KYI MCHOD PA 'BUL BA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RI KHROD DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS KYI MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL BA'I TSIG BCAD GCIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
